about_the_game: Something has gone horribly wrong during your experiments and your colleagues are turning into zombie-like creatures, controlled by a mysterious fungus. You must step into the shoes of a scientist and try to fix what's been broken, but can it be undone? Mycosis is an action-packed platformer set in an underground laboratory complex. Battle against a range of enemies, with the majority being fungus-infected zombies. Collect a variety of items and solve simple puzzles to progress. Drawing inspiration from iconic games such as Abuse and Half-life, as well as everyday laboratory work, Mycosis provides an immersive gaming experience.
